sys_script_include.name: employeeFunc

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_b76e2199478c0a1014300592e36d43b4
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1025229_topup_0.employeeFunc</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>employeeFunc</name><script><![CDATA[var employeeFunc = Class.create();
employeeFunc.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    logged_in: function() {
        var time = new GlideTime();
        var emp = this.getParameter('sysparm_employee');
        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_1025229_topup_0_user_details');
        gr.addQuery('employee', emp);
        gr.addActiveQuery();
        gr.query();

        if (gr.next()) {
            //Object For the Sending Values
            var uObj = {};
            uObj.card_number = gr.card_number.toString();
            uObj.project = gr.project.toString();
            uObj.manager = gr.manager.toString();
            uObj.bank_name = gr.bank_name.toString();
            uObj.email = gr.email.toString();
            uObj.contact = gr.contact.toString();
            uObj.name = gr.name.toString();
            gs.info(time + ' |  ' + uObj);
            // 			return gr.sys_id.toString();

            return JSON.stringify(uObj);
        } else {
            return '1';
        }
    },
    setValues: function() {
		var emp = this.getParameter('sysparm_employee');
        var cNum = this.getParameter('sysparm_card_number');
        var bName = this.getParameter('sysparm_bank_name');

        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_1025229_topup_0_user_details');
        gr.addQuery('employee', emp);
        gr.addActiveQuery();
        gr.query();
		
        if (gr.next()) {
            gr.setValue('card_number', cNum);
            gr.setValue('bank_name', bName);
            gr.update();
			return true;
        }
		return false;
    },
    type: 'employeeFunc'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-29 09:44:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>b76e2199478c0a1014300592e36d43b4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>employeeFunc</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Topup Travel Card" source="x_1025229_topup_0">6cd82a054777311014300592e36d43d6</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Topup Travel Card">6cd82a054777311014300592e36d43d6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b76e2199478c0a1014300592e36d43b4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-29 09:44:59</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
